title: Samsung Galaxy Note 7 vs iPhone 6S Plus: What's the difference? | Trusted Reviews
description: **Samsung Galaxy Note 7 vs iPhone 6S Plus: Battle of the phablets**Samsung has had an impressive run of things in 2016. It started off with thecritically acclaimed [Galaxy S7]()We haven’t had enough time to fully test out the battery on the Note 7, butyou’ll be happy to hear it’s fully loaded with extras. There’s wirelesscharging, fast charging and it’s the first Samsung phone to use USB-C.## Note 7 vs iPhone 6S Plus – Early VerdictThese are two great phones, but hard to compare, as they’ve come out at suchdifferent times. Both are pricey, high-powered phones, but the Note 7 is thenewer model and as such has many more advancements than the iPhone 6S Plus.**[Buy Now: Galaxy Note 7 at Amazon.com from $903](http://amzn.to/2bJSvIw)**We’ll have to spend more time with the Note 7 to really see how good it is.**[Buy Now: iPhone 6S Plus at Amazon.com from $695](http://amzn.to/2bsGgm5)  **   **Related:[Best phones 2016](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-android-phones-1_round-up)****Watch The Refresh: The best tech gossip and reviews every week****Which phablet reigns supreme, Apple’s iPhone 6S Plus or Samsung’s new Note7? Share your thoughts in the comments below.**
